page.title: 03Weather Report April - May
page.content: Primaries 1 - 4 at Tongue School re corded the weather morning and after noon for four weeks beginning 13.4.85. During this period it was very overcast, clouds being recorded six teen times with rain on nine of them. However there were thirteen sunny recordings but on the whole the weather was cool and the general complaint was of low temperatures for the time of year. The area though not as stormy as the northwest corner, tends to be showery with a fair amount of wind. If the winds are from the north for any length of time, vegetation suffers.
